item.description:
John and Jen are going to party RIGHT, before taking off for their future journeys.

Come hang with these guys and all of us and have a good time at a cozy stylish lounge in New Haven that will have a great crowd, great music and lost of fun.

We're making this a night to remember. Come be a part of the experience!

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Previously:

:::::::::::::::::::::::

Yes, this is happening and it is happening BIG. 

Please join the facebook page so I can add you to the guest list since this is an invite only event.

We got a great crowd coming that is ready to have fun. I'm looking forward to it. 

If you got questions about the event, message me or John. You can text me directly at 860 - 255 - 8675. My phone will be on all night. 

http://www.facebook.com/pages/Euro-Ultra-Night/215712631811373

More info about the event:

http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=155262254553547

 

-----------------------------------

How the event came about:

 

I spoke to John about this and he said I should post it as a suggestion.

 

Recently, I have met a lot of nightclub venue owners around CT during my DJing pursuings.

 

A lot of them are looking for business right now. I have spoken to at least a couple that are willing to let you come in, bring your own people, bring your own music, while they will provide the alcohol and the venues.

 

It would be like us having the venue to ourselves pretty much. Others might pop in, but that's cool. More people = more fun.

 

We can basically set up an NYC style club night right here in new haven. I DJ house and Euro so music will be off the hook. The place would be on fire.

 

I wanted to see if this would be of interest to the group. If so, I can approach these venues and speak to them about this.

 

There is a particular location I'm looking at specifically - Crown St. Cafe - which is on the corner of Black Bear in New Haven.

 

We would need to get about 60 people to make this happen. So meetup, friends, friends of friends, facebook, etc.

 

Potential date is end of August. 27th for now.

 

Please let me or John know if this is something you'd be interested in this and we can go from there.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

Hey, this ain't an ending. Just the beginning! So let's do it RIGHT! :)
item.name: Jen and John's Going Away Party!!! Our Own Club Venue in New Haven!!
